openai.name: OpenAI
openai.description: Offers advanced models for language, image generation, and audio conversion.

text-completion-openai.name: OpenAI (Text Completion)
text-completion-openai.description: Includes GPT-3.5 Turbo models optimized for text completion tasks.

azure.name: Azure OpenAI
azure.description: Provides access to OpenAI's GPT-4, Codex, and other models through Azure integration.

azure_ai.name: Azure AI Studio
azure_ai.description: Incorporates Cohere Command, Mistral Large, and AI21 Jamba Instruct models.

vertex_ai-ai21_models.name: Vertex AI AI21
vertex_ai-ai21_models.description: Supports text generation and completion, ideal for summarization, content creation, and conversational agents.

vertex_ai-anthropic_models.name: Vertex AI Anthropic
vertex_ai-anthropic_models.description: Can be implemented for ethical and aligned conversational AI applications.

vertex_ai-chat-models.name: Vertex AI Chat
vertex_ai-chat-models.description: Can be implemented for real-time conversational interfaces and customer support.

vertex_ai-code-chat-models.name: Vertex AI Code Chat
vertex_ai-code-chat-models.description: Can be implemented for interactive coding assistance and debugging workflows.

vertex_ai-code-text-models.name: Vertex AI Code Text
vertex_ai-code-text-models.description: Suitable for generating and completing code snippets for development tasks.

vertex_ai-embedding-models.name: Vertex AI Embedding
vertex_ai-embedding-models.description: Enhances search, classification, and clustering in data-rich applications.

vertex_ai-image-models.name: Vertex AI Image
vertex_ai-image-models.description: Enables image generation for design, marketing, and creative projects.

vertex_ai-language-models.name: Vertex AI Language
vertex_ai-language-models.description: Suitable for natural language understanding and multilingual processing tasks.

vertex_ai-llama_models.name: Vertex AI Llama
vertex_ai-llama_models.description: Ideal for advanced language modeling and conversational AI use cases.

vertex_ai-mistral_models.name: Vertex AI Mistral
vertex_ai-mistral_models.description: Useful for text generation and instruction tasks in edge and lightweight environments.

vertex_ai-text-models.name: Vertex AI Text
vertex_ai-text-models.description: Designed for text generation and language understanding in chatbots and content automation.

vertex_ai-vision-models.name: Vertex AI Vision
vertex_ai-vision-models.description: Can be implemented for visual analysis, object detection, and image recognition.

gemini.name: Gemini - Google AI Studio
gemini.description: Access Google’s Gemini Pro, 1.5 Pro, and Pro Vision models for multimodal AI.

sagemaker.name: AWS Sagemaker
sagemaker.description: Supports Jumpstart Huggingface embedding models and Meta’s Llama series.

bedrock.name: AWS Bedrock
bedrock.description: Offers embedding, image, and natural language processing models.

mistral.name: Mistral AI API
mistral.description: Provides embedding, coding, edge, math, image, and multimodal reasoning models.

codestral.name: Codestral API
codestral.description: Features a robust code completion model for plugins or direct queries.

text-completion-codestral.name: Codestral API (Text Completion)
text-completion-codestral.description: Access Codestral's latest and 2405 text completion models.

cohere.name: Cohere
cohere.description: Offers the Command family for text generation, Rerank for search optimization, and Embed for search, classification, and clustering.

cohere_chat.name: Cohere (Chat)
cohere_chat.description: Designed for conversational agents in customer support, chatbots, and virtual assistants.

anyscale.name: Anyscale
anyscale.description: Offers Llama Chat, Code Instruct, and Mistral Instruct models for versatile applications.

huggingface.name: Huggingface
huggingface.description: Provides Meta-Llama, Falcon, MPT, CodeLlama, WizardCoder, and Phind models, along with custom models.

perplexity.name: Perplexity AI (pplx-api)
perplexity.description: Includes Llama 3.1 Sonar, OpenHermes Mistral, and PPLX Chat completion models.

groq.name: Groq
groq.description: Features Llama, Mixtral, Gemma, and Whisper Speech-to-Text models.

together_ai.name: Together AI
together_ai.description: Offers Llama, Falcon, Alpaca, and other Chat and Code LLMs, along with language/instruction models.

databricks.name: Databricks
databricks.description: Supports text summarization, code generation, image generation, virtual assistants, synthetic data generation, and content creation.

cerebras.name: Cerebras
cerebras.description: Delivers chat completion models for conversational AI tasks.

friendliai.name: FriendliAI
friendliai.description: Features vision, instruct, chat, and coding models aggregated from multiple providers.

deepseek.name: Deepseek
deepseek.description: Advanced models like DeepSeek LLM, Coder, Math, VL for various AI-driven tasks, from coding to math reasoning and vision-language applications

fireworks_ai.name: Fireworks AI
fireworks_ai.description: Provides a model library for serverless applications, with over 140 LLMs, stable diffusion and Flux image models, and Whisper series speech models.

cloudflare.name: Cloudflare Workers AI
cloudflare.description: Workers AI: Features Meta’s Llama, Mistral Instruct, and CodeLlama models.

deepinfra.name: DeepInfra
deepinfra.description: Includes Meta’s Llama, Mistral Instruct, and CodeLlama models.

ai21.name: AI21
ai21.description: Showcases Jamba-1.5 (Mini and Large) and J2 series (Light, Mid, Ultra) models.

nlp_cloud.name: NLP Cloud
nlp_cloud.description: Supports models for text, image, audio, and video generation.

replicate.name: Replicate
replicate.description: Hosts Llama Chat (70B & 13B), Vicuna, and Flan-T5 models.

voyage.name: Voyage AI
voyage.description: Includes text embedding models for coding, finance, law, multilingual, and multimodal tasks.

aleph_alpha.name: Aleph Alpha
aleph_alpha.description: Features the Luminous model series for advanced AI applications.

openrouter.name: OpenRouter
openrouter.description: Aggregates text, chat, and vision models from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google PaLM, and Meta’s Llama.

watsonx.name: IBM watsonx.ai
watsonx.description: Diverse range of foundation models across domains like cybersecurity, translation, Q&A, and image processing with strong governance and customization options.

predibase.name: Predibase
predibase.description: Supports models from the Llama, Qwen, Mistral, and Gemma series for a variety of AI-driven tasks, including text generation and language understanding.

volcengine.name: Volcano Engine
volcengine.description: Includes Bytedance Doubao model series for AI applications.

clarifai.name: Clarifai
clarifai.description: Integrates Llama, Mistral, Jurassic, WizardCoder, Anthropic, OpenAI, GCP, Cohere, Databricks, Microsoft, and Salesforce models.

baseten.name: Baseten
baseten.description: Features Falcon, Wizard, and MPT models.

sambanova.name: Sambanova
sambanova.description: Offers high-performance for Llama 3 series that excels in real-time inference for dynamic AI workloads.

github.name: Github
github.description: GitHub Models enable more than 100 million developers to build with industry-leading AI models.

petals.name: Petals
petals.description: Enables text generation with distributed Llama 3.1, Mixtral, Falcon, and BLOOM models, along with fine-tuning capabilities.

anthropic.name: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.
